text: The 2015 World Match Racing Tour was a series of match racing sailing regattas staged during 2015–16 season. Ian Williams won the tour, his sixth title, by defeating Taylor Canfield in the final of Monsoon Cup. ==Regattas== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Dates ! Regatta ! City ! Country !
